scripts.check:rs: cargo fmt --manifest-path apps/repo-manage/Cargo.toml --check && cargo clippy --manifest-path apps/repo-manage/Cargo.toml
scripts.check:rs:fix: cargo fmt --manifest-path apps/repo-manage/Cargo.toml && cargo clippy --manifest-path apps/repo-manage/Cargo.toml --fix --allow-dirty
scripts.check: pnpm check:ts && pnpm check:rs && pnpm check:md
scripts.fix: pnpm check:ts:fix && pnpm check:rs:fix && pnpm check:md:fix
scripts.validate: pnpm check && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test
